devdoc.author: Babylon Finance Protocol UniswapPoolIntegration protocol integration

params._minAmountsOut: Array of min token quantities to receive from the pool
params._pool: Pool info e.g. PoolId or Address of the pool token to join + metadata
params._poolTokensIn: Pool tokens to exchange for the underlying tokens
params._tokensOut: Array of token addresses to withdraw

returns._0: address                 Address of the LP token
address                 Address of the pool itself

params._pool: OpData e.g. Pool address to check

returns._0: bool                 True if the address is a pool

params._maxAmountsIn: Array of max token quantities to pull out from the garden
params._pool: OpData e.g. Address of the pool token to join
params._poolTokensOut: Min amount of pool tokens to receive
params._tokensIn: Array of token addresses to deposit

returns._0: address                 Total supply of the token

devdoc.title: BalancerIntegration

exitPool(address,bytes,uint256,address[].notice: Exits a liquidity pool. Accrue protocol fee (if any)

getLPToken(address).notice: Returns the actual address of the LP token. Different for curve.

getName().notice: Returns the name of the integration

getPool(address).notice: Gets the underlying pool that holds the internal tokens. Different for curve.

isPool(bytes).notice: Checks whether a pool address is valid

totalSupply(address).notice: Returns the total supply of the pool tokens
